info.title: Learnado API
info.description: This is a simple API for an e-learning application

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to retrieve notifications

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to create user account

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to delete

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing user ID

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete user account

get.summary: List accepted users with optional pagination and filters

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for user details

parameters.name: PER_PAGE
parameters.description: Number of users to return per page

parameters.name: ORDER_BY
parameters.description: Column to order the results by

parameters.name: DIRECTION
parameters.description: Direction to order users

parameters.name: PAGINATION
parameters.description: Boolean to specify if pagination is enabled

400.description: Invalid request

500.description: Internal server error

get.summary: List pending user accounts with optional pagination and filters

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword for user details

parameters.name: PER_PAGE
parameters.description: Number of users to return per page

parameters.name: ORDER_BY
parameters.description: Column to order the results by

parameters.name: DIRECTION
parameters.description: Direction to order users

parameters.name: PAGE
parameters.description: Page number to retrieve

parameters.name: PAGINATION
parameters.description: Boolean to specify if pagination is enabled

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Filter users by keyword

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Filter users by role; multiple roles can be specified as comma-separated values (e.g., 1,2)

parameters.name: PER_PAGE
parameters.description: Number of users per page

parameters.name: ORDER_BY
parameters.description: Attribute to order users by

parameters.name: DIRECTION
parameters.description: Direction of sorting, asc or desc

parameters.name: PAGINATION
parameters.description: Enable pagination (true or false)

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to reject user account

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to suspend

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied

404.description: Not Found - User account not found

500.description: Internal Server Error

message.example: An error occurred while suspending the account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to update

requestBody.description: Optional data for updating a user account. At least one field must be provided, excluding email.

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or validation failure

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to update user account

message.example: An internal server error has occurred

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user account to validate

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid ID supplied

404.description: Not Found - User account not found

500.description: Internal Server Error - Unable to validate user account due to server error

message.example: An internal server error has occurred.

400.description: Invalid request

500.description: Internal server error

password.description: Minimum length based on configuration, must match password confirmation, and adhere to defined regex

profile_picture.description: Profile picture file, adheres to defined MIME types and max file size

role.description: User role, must be one of the predefined enum values

400.description: Invalid request

email.description: User's email address to which the password reset link will be sent.

400.description: Bad Request

message.example: Unable to process request due to invalid input.

500.description: Internal Server Error

message.example: An error occurred while processing your request.

requestBody.description: Payload to set a new password for a user

password.description: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid request format or parameters

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to set password

requestBody.description: Refresh token required to obtain a new access token

401.description: Unauthorized, invalid or expired refresh token

500.description: Internal server error, e.g., failed to generate an access token

requestBody.description: Data needed to create a new category

category.description: The name of the category to be created. Must be unique and cannot exceed the maximum string length defined in the configuration.

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to create category

parameters.name: categoryId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the category to be deleted

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing category ID

500.description: Internal Server Error - Failed to delete category

400.description: Invalid request due to incorrect input or missing fields

401.description: Unauthorized - User not authorized to perform this action

get.summary: List categories with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filter by category name

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page for pagination

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Field to order by

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of sort, either asc or desc

500.description: Internal Server Error

parameters.name: PER_PAGE
parameters.description: Number of categories per page

parameters.description: Field to sort the categories

parameters.description: Sorting direction, either ASC or DESC

parameters.name: PAGINATION
parameters.description: Enable or disable pagination

description.example: A complete path for full stack development

parameters.description: The ID of the step from which the quiz will be deleted

requestBody.description: Quiz update data including questions and answers

patch.summary: Update details of a specific step

parameters.description: The ID of the step to update

requestBody.description: Step update data including optional fields for media management

media_urls.description: URLs of new media to be associated with the step
